id: User journey map template for Notion
name: User journey map template for Notion
description: Notion template of a user journey map. features: Notion database with 2 sample user personas and user persona template; User map Notion template with linked user persona; Practical tips on creating user journey maps; Pay what you feel is right (you can enter 0 to get the free version); You will receive an email with the link to the Notion page with prompts you can keep.
